guide.title: Betting School
guide.subtitle: 7 lessons to get started
guide.congratsDesc: You've completed the betting school. Now try your first AI prediction!
guide.l1s1: A bet is a prediction on a sports event. You choose an outcome, the bookmaker offers odds. If your prediction is correct, you win!
guide.l1s2:
Bet ‚Ç¨10 on Liverpool to win at odds 2.10
If they win: 10 √ó 2.10 = ‚Ç¨21 (profit ‚Ç¨11)
If they don't: you lose ‚Ç¨10
guide.l1s4:
Odds indicate how much you can win and the probability of the outcome:

1.30 = very likely (~77%)
2.00 = 50/50
5.00 = unlikely (~20%)
guide.l2s1:
Over 2.5 = 3 or more goals in the match
Under 2.5 = 2 or fewer goals

One of the most popular types. AI often recommends totals as they're more predictable with statistics.
guide.l2s2:
Handicap (-1) Liverpool:
Must win by 2+ goals
2:0 ‚Üí won | 1:0 ‚Üí lost

Handicap (+1.5) Man City:
Can even lose by 1 goal
0:1 ‚Üí won
guide.l2s3:
Yes = both teams score at least 1 goal
No = at least one team doesn't score

2:1 ‚Üí Yes wins
2:0 ‚Üí No wins
guide.l2s4:
Covers 2 outcomes out of 3:
1X = home win OR draw
X2 = draw OR away win
12 = home win OR away win

Lower odds, but safer. Great for beginners!
guide.l2s5:
Multiple bets in one. Odds multiply:
1.80 √ó 1.85 = 3.33

All predictions must be correct! If even one is wrong, you lose everything. High risk, high reward.
guide.l4s1:
Your bankroll is the money you dedicate to betting. It's NOT money for daily expenses.

Golden rule: only bet what you can afford to lose.
guide.l4s2:
Never bet more than 1-3% of your bankroll on a single bet.

Bankroll: ‚Ç¨100
Single bet: ‚Ç¨1-3

This protects you even during losing streaks.
guide.l4s3:
For beginners: always bet the same amount.

Don't increase after a loss!
Don't try to recover ‚Äî that's the most common mistake.
guide.l5s1:
Look at the last 5 results for each team.
Winning streak = good form
Losing streak = bad form
guide.l5s2:
The history of matches between the two teams.
Some teams historically struggle against others.
E.g.: 7 out of 10 Liverpool vs City ‚Üí Over 2.5
guide.l5s3:
Many teams are stronger at home.
Check home and away goal statistics.
guide.l5s4:
The absence of a key player can change everything.
If the main striker is out ‚Üí Under might be a good choice.
guide.l5s5:
AI analyzes ALL of this automatically:
‚Ä¢ Form from the last 10 matches
‚Ä¢ H2H stats from the last 5 years
‚Ä¢ Average goals, corners, cards
‚Ä¢ And gives you a prediction with confidence level

No need for hours of analysis ‚Äî AI does it in seconds.
guide.l6s2:
Why we recommend our partner:
‚úÖ Official international license
‚úÖ Payouts in 15 minutes ‚Äî even large amounts
‚úÖ Bonus up to {{bonus}} on first deposit
‚úÖ Convenient mobile app
‚úÖ 900+ football leagues available
‚úÖ Some of the highest odds on the market
‚úÖ 24/7 support in Italian/German/Polish

That's why AI Betting Bot is integrated with this bookmaker.
When AI gives a prediction ‚Äî you can bet right away.
guide.l6st1: Tap the button in the app
guide.l6st4: Make a deposit of any amount
guide.l6st5: Get a bonus up to {{bonus}} + PRO access in our app!
guide.l7st1: Open the app and check today's matches
guide.l7st2: Choose a match that interests you
guide.l7st3: Check the AI prediction with confidence level
guide.l7st4: Ask the AI if you have questions: "Why Over 2.5?"
guide.l7st5: Open the bookmaker and find the same match
guide.l7st6: Choose the AI-recommended outcome. Amount: 1-3% of bankroll!
guide.l7st7: Confirm the bet. Follow the result in the app!

kelly.title: Kelly Calculator

kelly.criterionDescription: Mathematically optimal bet sizing based on your edge and probability estimate
kelly.oddsHint: The odds offered by the bookmaker
kelly.probabilityHint: Your estimation of the true winning probability
kelly.bankrollHint: Your total betting bankroll for stake calculation
kelly.fractionHint: Half or quarter Kelly is often recommended to reduce variance
kelly.negativeEdge: Kelly suggests not betting ‚Äî negative edge
kelly.step1Desc: Compare your probability estimate to implied odds probability
kelly.step2Desc: Kelly formula tells you exactly how much of your bankroll to bet
kelly.step3Desc: Half or quarter Kelly reduces variance significantly while keeping most of the growth
kelly.proTipText: Only use Kelly when you have a genuine edge. If unsure, bet smaller or skip.

oddsConverter.title: Odds Converter
oddsConverter.americanExplain: American odds show how much you win on $100 bet (positive) or how much to bet to win $100 (negative)
oddsConverter.decimalExplain: Decimal odds show total payout per $1 bet, including your stake
oddsConverter.fractionalExplain: Fractional odds show profit relative to stake (e.g., 5/1 means $5 profit per $1 bet)
oddsConverter.impliedExplain: Implied probability shows the bookmaker's estimated chance of an outcome occurring
